meanings.sent1: In the essay, each subparagraph discusses a different point.
meanings.sent2: Please read the subparagraph carefully to understand the main idea.
meanings.sent3: The little subparagraphs in the story were like tiny puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were neatly organized into neat subparagraphs, like a filing cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful tabs to label each subparagraph for easy reference.

meanings.definition: A section of a legal document that is subordinate to a main paragraph.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer highlighted an important point in the subparagraph of the contract.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to review every subparagraph in the agreement before signing.
meanings.sent3: The tiny font in the subparagraph made it feel like a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The subparagraph in the contract was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The judge carefully analyzed each subparagraph to make a fair decision.
